channel.title: TB -- Along with "::" tele commands! Help please
channel.description: How can i make it so, tb, stops you from using a command such as... ::pk (telies you to pkbox or something)

item.title: TB -- Along with "::" tele commands! Help please
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

so say the command was,

if (command.startsWith("pk")) {
teleportToX = 3243;
teleportToY = 3517;
}

Where would it go, can u post the whole command here?

thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 06:35:47 PM[/size][hr]:S!"?"?"

Read full topic
item.source: TB -- Along with "::" tele commands! Help please

item.title: TB -- Along with "::" tele commands! Help please
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Put this in the command:

if(!teleblock) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); }

Read full topic
